Rulings.Base: 1. This effect does not target.\n2. You can use this effect on a 'Six Samurai' monster that was attacked while face-down and flipped face-up as a result.

PSCT.Base: During damage calculation, in either player's turn, if a "Six Samurai" monster you control battles: You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard; that monster cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.
